PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09202019-06-22TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Motor Vehicle Safety Act (Notice of Defect and Notice of Non-compliance)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY ACT (NOTICE OF DEFECT AND NOTICE OF NON-COMPLIANCE) in order to (1) improve the alignment of motor vehicle defect and non-compliance requirements with United States requirements; (2) improve motor vehicle safety by making enhanced vehicle safety information available to the Minister, and to vehicle or equipment owners and retailers; and (3) improve departmental oversight of safety defects and instances of non-compliance with the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0253 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
